items.title: Aventon’s Pace 500.3 step-through cruiser e-bike is the last of the legacy models in stock at its $1,499 yearly low
items.summary:
Aventon is still offering its Pace 500.3 Step-Through Cruiser e-bike at $1,499 shipped, after the Aventure 2 and Level 2 e-bikes have officially gone out of stock (and might be officially getting discontinued). Before all the new e-bikes were launched over 2025, this model carried a $1,799 full price, and has been regularly discounted to $1,499 over the last year, while holding the discount since 2026 began. While we have seen it going as low as $1,399 in 2024, the $300 markdown here is the best price we have tracked since then, giving you a final chance to pick it up here before joining the Aventure 2 and Level 2 e-bikes.
